author: t105362506
body:
import this module "Import-Module PSScheduledJob" & get this error message

i don't know how to fix this error

Error message: Import-Module: Module 'PSScheduledJob' is blocked from loading using Windows PowerShell compatibility feature by a 'WindowsPowerShellCompatibilityModuleDenyList' setting in PowerShell configuration file.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: PSScheduledJob module that is not PS-Core compatible and was explicitly blocked.

comments.author: t105362506
comments.body:
But i need use ScheduledJob  and this error message told me run "Import-Module PSScheduledJob"


ErrorMessage: Get-ScheduledJob: The 'Get-ScheduledJob' command was found in the module 'PSScheduledJob', but the module could not be loaded. For more information, run 'Import-Module PSScheduledJob'.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Today we can use ScheduledJob only with Windows PowerShell.

comments.author: t105362506
comments.body:
but  before can  run Scheduled in  powershell vscode  , so now we can't use this module in the vs code ?

 
---------------------------------------

This is another vm , i can't start powershell have any idea?

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54572002/82531202-72ed8580-9b71-11ea-82a4-ef710bda555d.png)

comments.author: doctordns
comments.body: The cmdlets in that module do not work with Powershell 7 either natively or via the Win32compat mechanism. Your only option is to run them with Windows PowerShell.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: You could ask Windows team using Windows 10 feedback tool or UserVoice site.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Can't not import PSScheduledJob module
